.. _`design_system_components_relatedobjects`:

RelatedObjects
==============

.. figure:: images/component_relatedobjects.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

A plugin container component to show objects related to an object.
The relations are configurable.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.plugin_containers.RelatedObjects.RelatedObjects`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_persontile`
